HOME ABOUT FAUCET CHAIN

QRL Mainnet

Bootstrap Files

Use these files to speed up the syncing time for a QRL mainnet node.

The most secure approach is to spend the time to fully sync your node from scratch. This ensures your local chain is accurate to all other modes and that you are not running a forked chain.
If you don't need this security, you can use these files to bootstrap your node setup.

Un-tar these state files into your local ~/.qrl/data/ folder and start the node. This will start at the latest blockheight these files were made and only sync from there.

QRL Mainnet State Files

QRL_Mainnet_State.tar.gz -

QRL Mainnet State Checksums

Mainnet_State_Checksums.txt
StateData
Blockheight
blockLastHash
networkId
numConnections
numKnownPeers
state
uptime
version
Unix_Timestamp
Uncompressed_Chain_Size

QRL Testnet

Bootstrap Files

Use these files to speed up the syncing time for a QRL testnet node.

The most secure approach is to spend the time to fully sync your node from scratch. This ensures your local chain is accurate to all other modes and that you are not running a forked chain.
If you don't need this security, you can use these files to bootstrap your node setup.

Un-tar these state files into your local ~/.qrl-testnet/data/ folder and start the node. This will start at the latest blockheight these files were made and only sync from there.

QRL Testnet State Files

QRL_Testnet_State.tar.gz -

QRL Testnet State Checksums

networkId
